fullName: Signing up into the application: Sign Up with invalid password formats

labels.name: story
labels.value: Sign Up with invalid password formats

labels.name: testClass
labels.value: Sign Up with invalid password formats

name: Sign Up with invalid password formats

statusDetails.message:
1 expectation failed.
JSON path error doesn't match.
Expected: Password does not meet requirements
  Actual: Password must be 8-16 characters, include uppercase, lowercase, number, and special character

steps.name: Given  the base_uri of the application
Given  user sends a signup request with the following data
When  the user sends the post request to "/auth/sign-up" with the request payload
Then  the status code should be 400
And  the response should contain failed error "Password does not meet requirements" message
